header.topics: Travel, nicknames, superfoods, ANON, Housemates, croquet, cake, food
header.activity: Friends talking during lunch break at work

body.u: oh I meant to tell you I just booked my flight I was saving this for the Corpus
I booked my flights to the Netherlands for my first European conference
I'm actually very jealous so which part of the Netherlands?
er The Hague so the bit by the sea? it's like not far from Rotterdam airport
also er just sidebar do we know who spoke first? just out of interest
good okay that's cool when is your conference?
erm it's at the end of July and then for a week
the Friday off and like spending like two or three days just for fun there
I'm kind of overlooking the fact that it's a astrophysics conference and I'm supposed to be getting editorial leads
as in you have to like email round
loads of yeah oh my god
I'm like erm that looks good what's that?
this is my like quinoa mix
it's actually lazy food but my feta was going off so I thought I'd make it
and just eat it for lunches I also have like a massive batch of like a chicken like soupy noodle stuff in my fridge cos I had this craving for Wagamama's
but then like didn't erm go
so I wanted to make it
and I made it turns out a made like absolutely shedloads cos when you buy it like like bags of stuff from the Asian supermarkets you get loads erm
and gr I have industrial sized stuff
but I have a massive erm like casserole dish? that's just full of it and erm I'm not here this weekend and so I'm like try and eat as much food as possible
uhu oh they have ice cream
mm I've got a weird like egg and tomato sandwich that's not normal is it?
I wanted brown bread and this was the only brown bread
I'm sorry about your boring lunch we could have got a sandwich
it's fine I'm hungry but I'm not that interested in what to eat I think it's the hot weather
yeah I don't know I think I like food too much
yeah actually I think that cake just filled me up maybe that's why
it was really good and lemony
mm I wanna drink my water but I'm afraid the things will fly away
I love cake I don't know why we don't have cake more often at
there's always room for more cake
for a second I forgot 's name and I almost went hey awkward
it does just roll off the tongue doesn't it?
oh I can't remember who when I went erm so my friend had a barbeque erm like a while ago and like er me and like a few of those guys were there but was also there this was like
the first time he kind of like

met any people in like an actual group that wasn't an accidental run in and erm I got we were just discussing everyone at and the thing that we realised from this discussion is that like we just nickname everyone
what other some other what are there some what are some other nicknames?
well cos we've got awkward and then we have like
then we have like starey slash smiley guy erm beautiful man but then there's also top man
call him top man as well?
erm I don't think I've ever referred to him but that's that's who I know
but you know you know who I mean?
yeah from production who broke his penis
please tell me you've heard that story
I forgot about that thanks for reminding me
mm do you ever hear from him?
he erm he whatsapped me a while ago I told him erm had dyed her hair
white because he referred to her once as the Daenerys Targaryen of books
I think you told me that before and I was like
I was like he'd be so happy
erm I don't know who else we nickname
mm my god I quite like her dress
I would if I could pull it off
I feel like you need like a certain type of
figure to do it else it just looks like a
I have a long skirt in that looks comfy but again I'm I'm afraid of the same thing I should really send it up though
and did I tell you you know I was looking to move out?
but I think I've managed to negotiate a rolling contract so I'm gonna say
yeah I saw your Facebook post and I was like
yeah so I'm got two people coming round on Monday to take a look
one's a girl twenty-three a journalist and then one's a twenty-eight year old Spanish software engineer rows and climbs
yeah and then some girl who I kind of know messaged me on Facebook I think she's a bit weird
but I mean I'm planning not to be there for that long so like I said I don't really mind who moves in
I like him because him and his girlfriend have really quiet sex so it doesn't bother me
oh but you know it's happening
oh yeah I can hear the bbed springs but that's all I can hear I'm like oh I'll just turn this up
that's what I look for in a housemate I feel bad for my housemates
this sandwich is really weird I'm like forcing myself to eat it
I don't know whether I've legitimately ever had egg in a sandwich I think the concept scares me
like egg mayo by itself but with tomatoes?
there's a taste in this that I can't identify which given that I made it I should be able to identify
I think it's onion but then sometimes I think it's ginger
like both of those are in here but I don't know what this specific taste is
god our chat is so interesting
hopefully it's recording otherwise we'll be like now it's wasted
I have no idea how loud that is so I don't know what it's actually picking up
shall I bring it closer to us?
I once recorded an entire interview on my phone

erm cos I was writing for erm like a student newspaper erm and just interviewed erm my friend who's my academic brother but was also like hosting some showing and doing loads of crap and I was like let's interview him but it worked really well on my Iphone
it was like really clear oh oh
croquet in fact when I went to they were playing croquet as well
of course oh I wanna talk about how weird t that guy was the other day
oh god I know right I'm so glad I wasn't the only one that noticed this
he was like I feel like he was either on cocaine or just acting like someone like that
yes I thi yeah I got the
yeah like just being completely like
egocentric and like flitting from thing to thing
yeah yeah yeah he like couldn't keep track of a thought it was so weird
was he like touching your leg did you say?
yeah he touched my leg at one point and like his face
what brushed it? or was like
it was more of a kind of just like like a thing
on my leg what is this?
cos at first I was just like oh yeah he seems really friendly la la la but he's
he Facebook messaged me as well
yeah so like I was mm er it did get to a point halfway through where I was kind of like is this that being nice to strange men thing I was
warned about or is this okay?
did say he had a girlfriend though?
I got the impression he did cos he picked up a phone call
during the set and he definitely said I love you on it
I was just like mm maybe he's just
like in one sense I kind of like that he was like kind of open and like up for
doing random stuff but in the other sense I was like who are you?
yeah no I definitely like er felt quite like comfortable with him actually
like apart from thinking he might be a psychopath I mean like
I kind of liked him cos he was really easy to chat to
but like yeah I was definitely a bit w cos I didn't register but then when I got home I was like wait did those guys say that was his car? cos he was off his face
he should not have been allowed to drive that home
cos even cos he'd blocked someone else in as well so even he'd have had to or someone would have had to have driven that to li to get erm
but I mean given the Facebook message I assume he's alive
but yeah I got home and I was suddenly like shit I don't think he should have been allowed to drive
but yeah it was weird cos er like he looks very young
but then from everything he does he sounds like he must be older cos he sounds quite successful in his career
but then he also sounds like he's just drunk and acts like he's just like high all the time so I was like mm
cos didn't he say he didn't go to uni? so I guess he's got like
he's got a life experience instead
I think he must be like rich though
mm oh yeah I bet that car was like his parents' or something
he was like you know like extremely though just like the blonde fluffy hair
the bloody four-wheel drive the yachts
he just didn't retain information though
and just and just like yeah Brummies there's not posh and I was like dude I swear you know I'm from there
and then there was that guy with the really funny laugh
yes the first time he did that cos he was
I was like oh my goodness
he was so lovely as well and then the first time that happened I was like wait what?
and there was one point I caught 's eye and we just started giggling I felt really mean
cos I think his friend clearly saw I was laughing at him
and I didn't wanna be mean
I actually think Wednesday was such a good day like genuinely I got home and I was really happy
I've no idea how long it's been literally I couldn't work it out
so did they bring their own croquet? I guess that's not press croquet
can you imagine being like oh yeah guys I brought in the croquet kit all the way to work so we can play at lunch?
maybe we can like rent it out from reception or something li that would be wonderful
I just get really like it tastes a bit like raw onion but you know like when you use a knife to cut onion and then you use the same knife to cut cheese?
and then you eat the cheese and it has little imprint of
onion in it? it tastes like that
but all the onion in here is cut
maybe like overnight the flavours soaked together and it produced something weird
maybe this is what happens when feta goes off uhu oh the sun's so in my eyes
I feel really sad I'm missing erm everything that's happening this weekend
mm I know cos I'm in London for my friend's thirtieth I'm gonna miss 's leaving and then
but hopefully I'll be able to catch them for a couple of hours on Sunday
yeah silly we did not time this well
I'm gonna take a break I think I've packed loads
the thing is it's mostly veg in there I actually used very very little quinoa
it's good cos it's kind of expensive isn't it?
yeah it's hard to get as well I literally
couldn't find it the first few months I was here like I actually bought it with me from Scotland
like when I went to erm over Easter I brought a pack down with me cos I've not been able to find it in

uhu uhu yeah I got erm er well I got a few vegan friends my course cos you know philosophy erm and one of the intr er like sent me this list I can't remember why I think we were just chatting about it once but he sent me this list of like superfoods erm which was included stuff like quinoa and chia seeds and bulgar wheat and stuff which I'd never but a lot of the stuff on there I'd never even heard of
I'm into bulgar wheat I don't know though
yeah I'm a big fan of bulgar wheat now
erm but yeah yes quite like making using grains that would definitely be described as a bit hipster
oh yeah I love my grains yeah mm mm never went down the is it chi of chia seed?
I don't actually know how you say them er it's definitely the I before the A
I don't know how you pronounce it I'd better learn otherwise you know
I quite like them erm I used to use them just to thicken things before
but my like and my housemate
I don't know if they do have a flavour basically my housemate who like works in nutrition but is one of most unhealthy people ever so it's really funny erm
housemate erm he because he works in nutrition he's always bringing back these weird ingredients and just trying stuff and at one point he like
because you can soak chia seeds and have them as like a like a substitute kind of cereal porridgey yogurty
thing? and no I've never done that but I know people who have and he did it and he mixed in matcha green tea powder?
and he was like do you think I can sell this? and like everyone was like that's disgusting and I was like quite like this
oh yeah people would love it
I think I may have put honey in it to soften it though
I like green juices and green smoothies so you go hipster all the way
I think we've probably hit our ten minutes now is it definitely ten minutes?
it's been seventeen shall we go for twenty?
's gonna be transcribing this and like you bastards
I hope it didn't catch the bit about the sex
I just wanted to erm send er well you or er tango class
things I keep forgetting cos I don't think they do them over the summer I think it's term time
I need to do something I read I have the urge to like go and learn neuroscience or something right now
I dunno how to do it but like
I just get really like bored not learning things
uhu I'm think I'm still like reeling
I still don't want to learn anything
well yeah it's been a year for me so I think I'm like
ready I really wanna do the course that you know does though
a like little half a diploma or whatever it is
that was really fun well not fun
I saw there was a erm like a beginner's coding thing being run here
but I don't like erm but yeah but that sounded interesting
it's run by the same guy who did choir
yeah that was my fault yeah
I think I'm getting a pink leg got
I really don't know what this taste is I hope it doesn't kill me

yeah I mean it was at the point where it was about to but it wasn't off when I used it
of course it's been a few days but
it doesn't taste like the feta it literally tastes like onion flavouring or something it was so weird to be fair it might be the tub
cos it looked like it just had a sandwich in it and I was too lazy to wash it
I may have just emptied the crumbs out
